name: Beacon Breach Intel
description: Continuously updated breach corpus with hashed credential dumps for corporate monitoring
playbook: Execute hashed credential search via CLI runner
Generate alert if corporate domain identified
Record ticket in incident tracker and attach evidence

name: Darklight Marketplace Tracker
description: Passive monitoring of high-risk darknet markets with anomaly detection alerts
playbook: Export incident indicators to TIP via CSV

name: Surface Watch Feeds
description: Aggregated surface web mentions and typosquatted domains with ML-based prioritization
playbook: Run brand keyword search with "surface" filter
Export prioritized list to stakeholders via JSON
